com.salimov.yurii.util.sender

Class SenderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.util.sender.SenderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sender, java.lang.Runnable

    public final class SenderImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sender
    The class implements a set of methods for sending letters by e-mail.

      • run

      • validate

        private boolean validate()
        Validates parameters to create sender: subject, text, recipient e-mail, sender e-mail, sender e-mail password.
        Returns:
        true if all parameters are valid to create sender, false otherwise.
